channel.title: Special attacks
channel.description: How do i add a hole special attack system to my server because it has no specials whats so ever not add one special to one weapon i mean a hole entire special attack system like voids and methods...

item.title: Special attacks
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Then I suggest if you haven’t done alot to your server, download a new premade source (a good one) and edit it.
It’s the best way and it doesn’t take as much effort as it would to completely make something your self.

Read full topic

item.title: Special attacks
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

lungxapples:

Uh i tryed but its hard cuz there like 2different sources so you dont really no where each gos…

You don’t have to put them in the same place as the source you’re copying off of. Just as long as they’re put in a place where they can function.
E.g. in Client.java for a code to function it must be under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Read full topic

item.title: Special attacks
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

I’m sure it takes a long time to make an entire Special Attack system. I reccommend downloading a source with specials on it and take the specials system of off it to ease yourself. Or use the search bar if you don’t want to do that and find a tutorial.
